Actions.Text: REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT
REPORTED REFERRED TO WAYS AND MEANS

Votes.VoteType: Favorable refer to committee Ways and Means

Title: Designates the Scajaquada heritage area and establishes the Scajaquada heritage area commission
Summary: Designates the Scajaquada heritage area as a state designated heritage area; establishes the Scajaquada heritage area commission to undertake all necessary actions to facilitate the creation of the Scajaquada heritage area, complete a management plan to ensure the long-term preservation and maintenance of such heritage area, and provide for the implementation and sustainability of undertaking recommendations of the completed management plan.
LawSection: Parks, Recreation and Historic Preservation Law
LawCode: Amd §35.03, add Art 41 §§41.01 - 41.19, Pks & Rec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, in relation to designating the Scajaquada heritage area and establishing the Scajaquada heritage area commission; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions upon expiration thereof
